item.description:
Well last weekend was a rain out and this Saturday looks beautiful..had to make sure. The river will be calmer by then too. So Come out and join me for a paddle up the river. We will stop at Memorial field and have lunch and rest. We can either go a bit farther up or back depending what people want to do. I am told the Porto potty will be there this time !!!

Edgewater canoe and kayak has many boats to choose from. They have 10' to 14' and all come with a paddle and vest. They must be worn on this event.  There are single and double ups. Also when bringing a lunch, remember that it has to fit in a smallish hold on a narrow boat so no bug coolers.

https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100002198253895

I will offer basic instruction to any new comers..we started somewhere..even me.

My number  603-315-0275

 

So bring your sunscreen, water, comfortable paddling cloths ( not all cotton) and a fun smile and join me on the water.
item.how_to_find_us: meet me at the boat ramp
item.name: Last minute Easy kayaking
